title: Fort Donelson National Battlefield: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar             Calendar         1862 was such a pivotal year for America. This battle happened in the first calendar month of the Civil War. We offer hundreds of programs and learning opportunities throughout the year...come and join us!   Each month, Fort Donelson National Battlefield offers special opportunities and programs...and all are incorporated into our event calendar. All programs that we offer are free and open to the public! Come and join us for...battle chats...Junior Ranger programs...movie nights...book club discussions....guest speakers....musical performances...and more! Our calendar of events is located here!
